name: Modern Design Leather Upholstery Ottoman
description: The Ottoman Leather Bed End Lift is a perfect addition to any bedroom. It entails a simple but elegant design that looks perfect with all types of bedroom themes. The simple leather upholstery of the bed makes it look super stylish, and Ottoman storage allows you to keep your bedroom well organized. This is an affordable luxury item that you can buy to enhance the storage space in your bedroom. The detailed stitching, that upholsters the faux leather onto the frame, gives the headboard the classiest look possible. Simplicity could not get more subtle and elegant than this. This fine detail of the leather bed blends in perfectly with almost every bedroom interior. Though the stitches are a minor part of the leather bed, they help you make a grand statement. The leather headboard is perfect to lean against as you use your tablet or read a book.
additionalFeatures: Ample Ottoman storage space. Sprung slats for elevated mattress support. Faux leather upholstery. Line-stitch decoration adds depth and symmetry. Padded leather headboard low profile foot-end. Gas-powered arms to lift the mattress. Delivered in Flatpack. Easy to assemble. All instructions and tools are included. Safety Standards: UK Fire Safety Compliant. Available in Dark Brown, Black and White. Available in 3ft Single, 4ft6 Double and 5ft Kingsize Bed

name: Delta wardrobe sliding one
description: The Delta Sliding Door Wardrobe is available in timeless white, black, and grey finishes, ensuring it complements any decor effortlessly. Plus, you can customize its interior further by adding an additional hanging rail, making it both practical and stylish. Each door of the wardrobe features 4 mirrored panels, offering a fresh perspective to any room and creating the illusion of additional space. Placing this wardrobe opposite a window enhances natural light, doubling its effect. The sliding doors operate effortlessly on aluminum rails, seamlessly concealing clothing and bringing instant tranquility to the bedroom.
additionalFeatures: Constructed from durable 16mm laminated particle board, resistant to scratches. Features contemporary diced design mirrors. name: HIGH GLOSS SYCYLIA WARDROBE 150-208-255CM
description: The Sycylia High Gloss Wardrobe is a sleek and stylish piece of furniture that offers a modern and elegant look to any bedroom. The wardrobe features a high-gloss finish that gives it a luxurious and sophisticated appearance. The wardrobe is also available in three different colors: white, black, and grey, allowing you to choose the perfect color to match your bedroom decor. The wardrobe is made from durable materials that are designed to last for years. The wardrobe is easy to assemble and comes with all the necessary tools and instructions. The wardrobe is backed by a 12-month manufacturer’s warranty, ensuring that you can enjoy your new wardrobe for years to come.

Ample Storage: The wardrobe will include a number of shelves, hanging rails, and drawers that will house all your clothes, shoes, and accessories. Anything will have its place!. LED Light Option: You can add LED lights for that extra fashion statement. The lights make it rather easy to see inside and give your room that cosy feel. Easy to Move Flat Pack: The wardrobe comes in a flat pack, therefore easy to move and assemble at any time.
